Package things.thing

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ActionManager
    If you need more control over how Actions are executed (e.g.
    ThingAction
    A ThingAction is some sort of computation, which can take a long time or not, running in the background or not.
    ThingQuery
    A ThingQuery is a query that is a tad more free-style than the default ones that can be executed via ThingReaders and ThingControl.
    ThingReader
    Project: things-to-build
    ThingWriter
    A ThingWriter is a backend component that is able to persist things.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractMetricsThingReader
    Created by markus on 30/05/14.
    AbstractSimpleThingReader
    Created by markus on 20/05/14.
    AbstractThingReader
    Project: things
    DefaultActionManager
    Default implementation of an ActionManager.
    FilterOperator<TYPE,R extends things.thing.Thing<TYPE>,I extends things.thing.Thing<?>>
    Convenience class to be able to populate a Thing as part of an Observable chain.
    PopluateOperator<T>
    Convenience class to be able to populate a Thing as part of an Observable chain.
    ThingControl
    Convenience class that extends ThingControlReactive and ThingControl and adds some convenience methods for (mostly) query purposes.
    ThingControlMinimal
    Minimal implementation of a central class that manages all things related, well…, things…
    ThingControlReactive
    Convenience class that extends ThingControl and adds some convenience methods for (mostly) query purposes.
